meanings.definition: A person or thing that determines or decides something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was the determinator of the class schedule.
meanings.sent2: The determinator of the game was the flip of a coin.
meanings.sent3: The determinator, a magic eight ball, made all the decisions for the group.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the determinator was portrayed as a wise old owl.
meanings.sent5: The determinator, a weather vane, pointed the way to go.

meanings.definition: A factor or circumstance that determines the outcome of something.
meanings.sent1: The weather was the determinator of our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The determinator of the experiment's success was the temperature.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain became the determinator of our outdoor party.
meanings.sent4: The determinator, a lucky charm, brought good fortune to the team.
meanings.sent5: The determinator, a crystal ball, foretold the future of the project.
